participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and active, enjoys spending time outdoors and values health.
participant_1.background: I'm doing my best to maintain a healthy weight. I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike. I am not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I would hope they would be supportive. I am a busy student who walks for exercise to de-stress after my kids go to bed. I check in with my pup.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, enjoys spending time with pets and watching entertaining content.
participant_2.background: I love to snuggle with my cats and watch funny videos on YouTube. My favorite band used to be Toto. My friends do not call me by my real name. I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood. My favorite hero is Flash.

content.text: Hey, what's up? How are you doing?
I'm alright. Watching funny cat videos on YouTube. How are you?
I'm doing okay, just taking a walk with my dog. It's a beautiful day out!
That sounds nice! I wish I could go for a walk, but I'm stuck inside with my cats.
I love cats! What are their names?
Their names are Mittens and Oreo. They're both really sweet, but Oreo is a bit of a troublemaker.
Oh no! I bet they're both adorable, though.
They are! They're my best friends.
I'm glad you have such good company. I'm not sure how I'd get by without my dog.
I know what you mean. Pets are the best.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to watch TV, play video games, and read. I also like to go to the movies.
Sounds like we have a lot in common. I also like to watch TV, play video games, and read. I don't go to the movies as much as I used to, but I still enjoy it.
That's cool! We should hang out sometime.
I'd love to! Let me know when you're free.
